title: AMAZING VIDEO EDITOR WANTED FOR 7-FIGURE BUSINESS
salary: On avg: 11 dollar per hour, (3 dollar per minute edited).
job_overview:
Amazing video editor wanted for 7 figure ecom brand

Hey there,

My team and I are looking for a new team member to join our amazing 7-figure eCommerce dropshipping business team.

Currently we are in need of someone that is responsible for the most important task of this business, video editing.
It's essential that you are experienced with eCommerce/dropshipping and video editing.

You will get the ads to edit from us every morning. Your job will be to translate and localize each ad into a danish version of that ad. First you will translate the ad script langugage to Danish and add new subtitles over the old ones. This will be translated using the Chatgpt prompts we provide you. You will use Elevenlabs to generate text to speech for the ad. After you have succesfully done this you will match the new generated audio to your danish subtitles in the timeline of the ad accurately. After this you will extract the music from the original sound of the ad using Upgrade to see actual info and then re-add that music to the new translated ad. The danish version of that ad is then finished. We like our workers to use capcut since it is easier to match the frames of subtitle change etc, but if you are very experienced with another editing software we are okay with you using it aslong as the results are fast and accurate.
